weapons.name: Lily of the Valley
weapons.description: A little and fragrant, bell-shaped spring flower. It will vanish with the next update.

weapons.name: Sword of Flames
weapons.description: A legendary sword that bursts into flames when wielded. It possesses the power to vanquish any foe.

weapons.name: Elven Bow
weapons.description: A finely crafted bow made by the skilled elven artisans. It shoots arrows with incredible accuracy and range.

weapons.name: Dwarven Warhammer
weapons.description: A massive warhammer forged in the depths of the dwarven mines. It can shatter even the strongest of armors.

weapons.name: Staff of Thunder
weapons.description: A magical staff that commands the power of thunder and lightning. It can summon storms and unleash devastating bolts of lightning.

weapons.name: Dragonscale Dagger
weapons.description: A razor-sharp dagger made from the scales of a slain dragon. It grants the wielder heightened agility and stealth.

weapons.name: Giant's Club
weapons.description: A colossal club carved from a giant's bone. Its sheer weight and impact can crush enemies into oblivion.

weapons.name: Crystal Wand
weapons.description: A beautiful wand adorned with shimmering crystals. It channels magical energy with precision and finesse.

weapons.name: Vampiric Blade
weapons.description: A wicked blade with a thirst for blood. It drains the life force of those it strikes, healing its wielder.

weapons.name: Enchanted Crossbow
weapons.description: A crossbow imbued with enchantments. It fires bolts with incredible force and can pierce through thick armor.

weapons.name: Phoenix Shield
weapons.description: A sturdy shield adorned with a phoenix emblem. It has the power to regenerate and protect the bearer from harm.
